verses.verse: Have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> on <S%H430>me,<s%> God, according to your loving <S%H2617>kindness.<s%> According to the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of your tender <S%H7356>mercies,<s%> blot <S%H4229>out<s%> my <S%H6588>transgressions.<s%>
<S%H3526>Wash<s%> me <S%H7235>thoroughly<s%> from my <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%> <S%H2891>Cleanse<s%> me from my <S%H2403>sin.<s%>
For I <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H6588>transgressions.<s%> My <S%H2403>sin<s%> is constantly before <S%H8548>me.<s%>

Against <S%H2398>you,<s%> and you only, have I sinned, and <S%H6213>done<s%> that which is <S%H7451>evil<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight;<s%> that you may be proved <S%H2135>right<s%> when you <S%H1696>speak,<s%> and <S%H2135>justified<s%> when you <S%H8199>judge.<s%>
<S%H2342>Behold,<s%> I was brought forth in <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%> In <S%H2399>sin<s%> my <S%H517>mother<s%> conceived <S%H3179>me.<s%>
<S%H2654>Behold,<s%> you desire <S%H571>truth<s%> in the inward <S%H2910>parts.<s%> You <S%H3045>teach<s%> me <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> in the inmost <S%H5640>place.<s%>
<S%H2398>Purify<s%> me with <S%H231>hyssop,<s%> and I will be <S%H2891>clean.<s%> <S%H3526>Wash<s%> <S%H3835>me,<s%> and I will be whiter than <S%H7950>snow.<s%>
Let me <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H8342>joy<s%> and <S%H8342>gladness,<s%> That the <S%H6106>bones<s%> which you have <S%H1794>broken<s%> may <S%H1523>rejoice.<s%>
<S%H5641>Hide<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> from my <S%H2399>sins,<s%> and blot <S%H4229>out<s%> all of my <S%H5771>iniquities.<s%>
<S%H1254>Create<s%> in me a <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> O <S%H430>God.<s%> <S%H2318>Renew<s%> a <S%H3559>right<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> within <S%H7130>me.<s%>
<S%H7993>Don't<s%> throw me from your <S%H6440>presence,<s%> and <S%H3947>don't<s%> take your <S%H6944>holy<s%> Spirit from <S%H7307>me.<s%>
<S%H7725>Restore<s%> to me the <S%H8342>joy<s%> of your <S%H3468>salvation.<s%> <S%H5564>Uphold<s%> me with a <S%H5081>willing<s%> <S%H7307>spirit.<s%>
Then I will <S%H3925>teach<s%> <S%H6586>transgressors<s%> your <S%H1870>ways.<s%> <S%H2400>Sinners<s%> shall be converted to <S%H7725>you.<s%>

<S%H5337>Deliver<s%> me from <S%H1818>bloodguiltiness,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H8668>salvation.<s%> My <S%H3956>tongue<s%> shall sing <S%H7442>aloud<s%> of your <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>
For you <S%H2654>don't<s%> delight in <S%H2077>sacrifice,<s%> or else I would <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H7521>it.<s%> You have no pleasure in burnt <S%H5930>offering.<s%>

The <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> are a <S%H7665>broken<s%> <S%H7307>spirit.<s%> A <S%H7665>broken<s%> and <S%H1794>contrite<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> you will not <S%H959>despise.<s%>
Do well in your <S%H3190>good<s%> <S%H7522>pleasure<s%> to <S%H6726>Zion.<s%> <S%H1129>Build<s%> the <S%H2346>walls<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

Then you will <S%H2654>delight<s%> in the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> in burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and in <S%H3632>whole<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings.<s%> Then they will <S%H5927>offer<s%> <S%H6499>bulls<s%> on your <S%H4196>altar.<s%>
